scripts.report-users: npm run report-signup-and-placement & npm run report-start-competence-v2
scripts.report-users-hard: npm run report-signup-and-placement-hard & npm run report-start-competence-v2-hard
scripts.report-orga: npm run report-orga-collective-results & npm run report-orga-participant-results & npm run report-orga-results
scripts.report-orga-hard: npm run report-orga-collective-results-hard & npm run report-orga-participant-results-hard & npm run report-orga-results-hard
scripts.report-all: npm run report-users & npm run report-users-hard & npm run report-orga & npm run report-orga-hard
scripts.start-connect: artillery run --config config/common.yml -e staging -o report/connect.json scenarios/connect.yml
scripts.start-competence-v2: artillery run --config config/common.yml -e staging -o report/start-competence-v2.json scenarios/signup-and-competence-test.yml
scripts.start-signup-and-placement: artillery run --config config/common.yml -e staging -o report/signup-and-placement.json scenarios/signup-and-placement.yml
scripts.start-signup-and-placement-hard: artillery run --config config/common.yml -e staging -o report/signup-and-placement-hard.json scenarios/signup-and-placement-hard.yml
scripts.start-test-users: npm run start-competence-v2 && npm run start-signup-and-placement
scripts.start-test-users-hard: npm run start-competence-v2-hard && npm run start-signup-and-placement-hard
scripts.start-orga-collective-results: artillery run --config config/common.yml -e staging -o report/orga-collective-results.json scenarios/orga-collective-results.yml
scripts.start-orga-participant-results: artillery run --config config/common.yml -e staging -o report/orga-participant-results.json scenarios/orga-participant-results.yml
scripts.start-orga-results: artillery run --config config/common.yml -e staging -o report/orga-results.json scenarios/orga-results.yml
scripts.start-orga-results-hard: artillery run --config config/common.yml -e staging -o report/orga-results-hard.json scenarios/orga-results-hard.yml
scripts.start-test-orga: npm run start-orga-collective-results && npm run start-orga-participant-results && npm run start-orga-results
scripts.start-test-orga-hard: npm run start-orga-collective-results-hard && npm run start-orga-participant-results-hard && npm run start-orga-results-hard
scripts.start-all: npm run start-test-users && npm run start-test-users-hard && npm run start-test-orga && npm run start-test-orga-hard
